column5: I'm not sure how I got on their mailing list but my best guest would be when I sighned up for thier rewards program.  Flyers once a month and a catolouge once year!  The only better mail is Musky Hunter mag:)
I believe it is sent to you when you join their rewards program.  I also got mine.  This is bad when you want to save money...

Isn't it funny how much pleasure we can get from perusing a nice thick shiny fishing tackle catalogue? I'm not even a big BPS shopper. Why bother when you have good local shops? But that doesn't mean I won't get hours of pleasure from looking at all the pretty pictures and checking out the latest gear offerings.  Happy reading y'all JF
Beware of the Bait Monkey! He lives in those shiny pages...HAHAHA.
Pretty pictures and shiny lures! That is good entertainment. haha.

Having a nice thick catalogue to peruse is a lot like staying at yer place. Your stuff just has fingerprints on it - and you probably have more line than any BPS store - and the dvds are already open and ready to watch without paying for 'em.  JF
I haven't received a BPS catalogue since they opened shop in Vaughan. That used to always be one of my best mail days......WAYYYYYYYY up on the list compared to property taxes.
haha got mine yesterday too. me and my 2 year old son have been pawing through the pages making mental notes of all the goodies we want.
I get mine yesterday as well
Ya picked mine up last night, My wife was looking at it this morning ? SBK
I have NEVER recieved one!
CABELA'S = one to three catalogs per WEEK in my mail box....
I got real excited on the boat prices then realized they at in US dollars. Bummer
the Canadian $  is now worth  1.00959 USD... go south and you'll actually save more.  Randy
Wow! 95 cents on the $100!!!
Don't joke Roy! You know how much savings that would be on a good used Queen Mary II? Neither do I.
I got one too I had to get my kids to hide it from me...
I got mine in the mail early this week. I didn't realize how much stuff I was going to need for my fly-in in September. ' Cause none of the gear I currently have is suitable.
And after the bank transfer fees it will still be less per dollar...

Got mine a few days ago too. That quote reminds me...When I was a small little guy I used to look forward to the day the Sears catalogue would show up in the mail hmmmm, the pretty pictures eh   :rofl2: Maybe ya have to be old to understand...

It's funny,  I've spent a fair bit of $$$$ @ BPS yet I don't think I've ever received a catalogue from them, yet I've only purchased a couple items from Cabelas and receive catalogues from them regularily, infact even when I moved north I still get them even though I never informed them of the move.
"bait monkey"  good one
I found mine in the front porch I dont know why it did not make it all the way into the house with the rest of the mail??? Any way I found it and I am sure the wife will be happy about that LOL
got mine last week or so...sears catolgue yes I remember the days when thats a all a young fella had to look at..If yo ulooked hard enough you could see.  .........lol
The dreaded Bait Monkey, as in the Monkey on our back...
Lew, I joined up for a comp (point)card this past year, 2010, maybe that's why they sent me a catalogue.
